snippet: Justice Thomas D. Raffaele said the uniformed officer flew into a rage on a Queens street last week and struck him, apparently mistaking him for a heckler.
abstract: New York State Supreme Court Justice Thomas D Raffaele identifies the New York Police officer he has accused of assaulting him during a contentious arrest of a man in Queens; Raffaele had stated that he was attempting to help control the crowd gathered around the arrest when he was struck by the officer.
lead_paragraph: Justice Thomas D. Raffaele said the uniformed officer flew into a rage on a Queens street last week and struck him, apparently mistaking him for a heckler.

headline.seo: Justice Thomas D. Raffaele Is Said to Identify Officer
headline.main: Judge Is Said to Identify Officer Accused of Hitting Him
headline.print_headline: Judge Is Said to Identify Officer Accused of Hitting Him
